variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: TARGET Subject id

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Gender

variable.name: RACE
variable.description: NAACCR Race
variable.value: Other Asian, incl Asian NOS and Oriental NOS

variable.name: ETHNICITY
variable.description: NAACCR Ethnicity
variable.value: Spanish NOS, Hispanic NOS, Latino NOS (based on more than just surname
Spanish surname only-no contrary evidence that the pt is not Hispanic

variable.name: AGE_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.description: Age at diagnosis, rounded to the nearest year

variable.name: WBC_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.description: White blood cell range at diagnosis

variable.name: CNS_STATUS_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.description: CNS status at diagnosis
variable.value: <5 CSF WBC/ul with blasts on cytospin
>5 CSF WBC/ul with blasts on cytospin and/or eye involvement, cranial nerve involvement, parenchymal brain involvement

variable.name: TESTICULAR_INVOLVEMENT
variable.description: Testicular disease status at diagnosis

variable.name: MRD_DAY8
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, in blood, day 8, 0.01% sensitivity

variable.name: MRD_DAY29
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, in blood, day 29, 0.01% sensitivity

variable.name: MRD_DAY43
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, day 43 of induction therapy

variable.name: MRD_END_CONSOLIDATION
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, end consolidation therapy

variable.name: FIRST_EVENT
variable.description: First Event

variable.name: YEARS_TO_EVENT
variable.description: Time to first event (or censoring), rounded to nearest 0.25 years

variable.name: TIME_TO_EVENT
variable.description: Time to first event (or censoring), in days

variable.name: VITAL_STATUS
variable.description: Vital Status

variable.name: YEARS_TO_DEATH
variable.description: Time to death, rounded to nearest 0.25 years

variable.name: TIME_TO_DEATH
variable.description: OS time (days)

variable.name: BONE_MARROW_SITE_OF_RELAPSE
variable.description: Relapse in bone marrow

variable.name: CNS_SITE_OF_RELAPSE
variable.description: Was the recurrent disease present in the central nervous system?

variable.name: TESTES_SITE_OF_RELAPSE
variable.description: Relapse in testes (male only)

variable.name: OTHER_SITE_OF_RELAPSE
variable.description: Specify the recurrent disease present in another site:

variable.name: ETV6-RUNX1 FUSION_STATUS
variable.description: Presence or absence of ETV6-RUNX1 (TEL-AML1) fusion detected by FISH, PCR or cytogenetics

variable.name: TRISOMIES_4_10_STATUS
variable.description: Trisomes 4 10 Status

variable.name: MLL_STATUS
variable.description: MLL Status

variable.name: TCF3_PBX1_STATUS
variable.description: Presence or absence of TCF3-RUNX1 (E2A-PBX1) fusion detected by FISH, PCR or cytogenetics

variable.name: E2A_PBX1_STATUS
variable.description: E2A PBX1 Status

variable.name: BCR_ABL_STATUS
variable.description: Presence or absence of BCR-ABL1 fusion detected by FISH, PCR or cytogenetics

variable.name: OTHER_MOLECULAR_LESIONS
variable.description: Specify other molecular abnormality:

variable.name: BMA_BLASTS_DAY8
variable.description: Percent of blasts in bone marrow aspirate at day 8 induction therapy

variable.name: BMA_BLASTS_DAY15
variable.description: Percent of blasts in bone marrow aspirate at day 15 induction therapy

variable.name: BMA_BLASTS_DAY29
variable.description: Percent of blasts in bone marrow aspirate at day 29 induction therapy

variable.name: BMA_BLASTS_DAY43
variable.description: Percent of blasts in bone marrow aspirate at day 43 induction therapy

variable.name: KARYOTYPE
variable.description: Karyotype

variable.name: DOWN_SYNDROME
variable.description: Down Syndrome

variable.name: DNA_INDEX
variable.description: DNA Index
